channel.title: Update: Meek not necessarily dead
channel.description:
Using a tweaked version that can speak Encrypted SNI is enough to keep Meek alive with some changes with providers like cloudflare.
They are essentially waiting for adoption of SNI support in the Go TLS and/or FF cipher-suite to make supporting it worthwhile.
https://lists.torproject.org/pipermail/tor-dev/2018-September/013452.html
cc/ @iry

item.title: Update: Meek not necessarily dead
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Using a tweaked version that can speak Encrypted SNI is enough to keep Meek alive with some changes with providers like cloudflare.

They are essentially waiting for adoption of SNI support in the Go TLS and/or FF cipher-suite to make supporting it worthwhile.

https://lists.torproject.org/pipermail/tor-dev/2018-September/013452.html
